description:
Destroy
1
random card in your hand, but add
3
random
Enhanced
face cards
instead.

Destroy
1
random card in your hand, but add
2
random
Enhanced
Aces
instead.

Destroy
1
random card in your hand, but add
4
random
Enhanced
numbered cards
instead.

Add a
Gold Seal
to
1
selected card.

Add
Foil
,
Holographic
, or
Polychrome
edition
(determined at random) to
1
selected card in hand.

Creates a random
Rare
Joker
(must have room), but sets money to
$0
.

Converts all cards in hand to a single random
suit
.

Converts all cards in hand to a single random
rank
, but
-1
hand size.

Add
Negative
to a random
Joker
, but
-1
hand size, plus another
-1
hand size for each time Ectoplasm has been used this run, e.g. using Ectoplasm 3 times in the same run decreases hand size by a total of 6 (1+2+3)

Destroys
5
random cards in hand, but gain
$20
.

Creates a copy of 1 of your Jokers at random, then destroys the others, leaving you with two identical Jokers. (
Editions
are also copied, except Negative)

Adds a
Red Seal
to
1
selected card.

Adds
Polychrome
to a random
Joker
, and destroys the rest.

Adds a
Blue Seal
to 1 selected card.

Adds a
Purple Seal
to 1 selected card.

Creates a
Legendary
Joker
(Must have room)
Artwork: This card is animated, with the gem beating like a heart, or perhaps something inside is trying to break out...

Upgrades every
poker hand
(including secret hands not yet discovered) by one level.
